title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.111 - Inventory; required substances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.111 - Inventory; required substances

State Regulations

Controlled substances listed in section
3306
of the Public Health Law are designated as inventory required substances and a biennial inventory shall be prepared and maintained in accordance with the provisions of section
80.112
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
80.111

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
